name: Scents of Wood NFT Subscription Collection

metadata.name: Scents of Wood Subscription 1
metadata.description: The World's First Fragrance Subscription exclusively available via an NFT. 2,222 NFTs available only. Each giving its holder access to 4 full-size, original 75ml scents, created by Scents of Wood perfumers, over 2 years. Each granting its holder voting rights on fragrance creation (starting with the 3rd fragrance), fund allocation and more. Each giving its holder access to events exclusive to the Scents of Wood NFT community.
